name: Nalfeshnee
description: The Nalfeshnee has a grotesque, towering frame combining features of a boar, an ape, and a vulture, with a massive body, tusked face, and wings.
memorable: Its ability to spread madness and fear through its Horrific Nimbus and Chaos Blast makes it a unique and formidable foe.
goals: Often serves as judges or overseers in the Abyss, commanding legions of lesser demons.
relations: Nalfeshnees might be encountered alongside other demons or as commanding figures of demon legions.
environment: Typically found in the chaotic realms of the Abyss.
strengths: Possesses high hit points, significant damage output through magical and melee attacks, and benefits from Magic Resistance.
weaknesses: Relatively slow movement speed compared to more agile creatures.
attacks: Multiattack includes a powerful bite, claw strikes, and a gore attack with significant damage potential.
most_powerful_ability: Chaos Blast deals substantial force damage and can alter the dynamics of a battle by affecting multiple enemies at once.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: With a passive perception of 16, it has good situational awareness.
additional_information: Immunities to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Ability to teleport up to 120 feet as a bonus action.
Can regain hit points by attacking frightened creatures.
Horrific Nimbus creates a panic-inducing radiance affecting foes nearby.
Sudden Feast allows it to heal and hinder defeated foes' death saving throws.
test_queries: fiend that spreads madness and fear
large demon with a tusked face
bulky fiend with horrifying attack abilities
